text: Nebraska is a 2013 American black and white movie set in Montana, Nebraska and South Dakota. It was directed by Alexander Payne, and starring Bruce Dern, Will Forte, June Squibb, Stacy Keach and Bob Odenkirk. It was nominated for six Academy Awards. == Other websites == * Category:2013 drama movies Category:2010s road movies Category:American drama movies Category:American road movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Montana Category:Movies set in Nebraska Category:South Dakota in fiction Category:Movies directed by Alexander Payne
title: Nebraska (movie)
